hello, so i have a question, i downloaded the game without a problem,, it was fast and simple, but when ever i start a new game, i hit the campaign button and the game just closes to the desktop, an i supposed to open it somewhere else other than the desktop icon or something

dayday64:try to run the game in compatibility mode windos xp,if that doesn't work,try to reinstall the game,and if that doesn't work either,well i think your computer can't handle the game,i hope this help you to play this awesome game dude
Silverman84:that happen to me one time,but it fixed by itself,i think is just a bug of the game but i'm not really sure
do I need a CD-R disc for this download?
kriss510:no dude,no discs [ISO images] are needed to install this game,just unrar and click on the .exe file
cool actually AWESOME cause I love this game
so I just download the game and start playing no more

kriss510:well you have to install it,but its not complicated,all the instructions are inside,to unrar it'll ask you a passwork,its inside the readme,and then you just have to wait like 5 or 10 minutes for the game to install,and that's it! you can play the game
but do I have to download unrar or something like that?

kriss510:the program you need to decompress a .rar file is called "Winrar" just google it,is totally safe,when you have it,and the torrent is complete,go to the downloads folder,that's the default folder for torrents files,and then right click on the three little book with the name of "star wars republic commando[chk]" select "extract here" an put the password provided in the readme when its all extracted just click on the "[PC-Full]-SW-Republic.Commando.exe" and wait for the installation,then you can play the game.

kriss510:sorry man i didn't check the comments in a while,well probably it's because it's ripped off or it need some kind of patch for the multiplayer just check it on google for a multiplayer patch maybe you can fix it by installing it,i've never liked the multiplayer features in games that's the reason i don't know if its working or not,i wish you luck and hope it does work with a patch
ok man will do and thanks ones again for the download best star wars game ever

Great torrent, quick download and works perfectly!
finally get to play my favourite FPS again!
To anyone who has issues with it crashing when you select "new game" go into graphics options and turn  the BUMP MAPPING down to low and it should work perfectly!

R4FAEL-I-:the password you need to put is "www.chilewarez.org" without the quotes

Hey, haveing a problem here. Ive downloaded alot of torrents in the past and this one seemed pretty straight forward. However when i downloaded this one with you torrent then extracted it with winrar i tried to start it up and it gave me a what software do you want to use to play this game with options such as adobe and itunes and the like. Any suggestions or solutoins

HUGESOADfan:I think your problem is that you didn't put the password when unraring the files,that gives you an incomplete set of files with the .bin file extension,if you follow the steps you should have three files,one .exe,the previous two .bat files and a text document,do it all again,unrar and put the password needed its "www.chilewarez.org" without the quotes and when you're done extracting just run the .exe file and the game should run flawlessly.

I downloaded and install the game perfectly fine and I can go to the games main menu but soon as I click start new game it just shuts down and I don't think it's my computer because my computer is capable of running games far more demanding then this one.. Help please
Gummruchk: try going into graphics options and turn the BUMP MAPPING down to low and it should work perfectly!
